name: Simple Parallel Universe Game
description:
A simple game where you can warp to a parallel universe by using teleporters.

I tried using PuzzleScript+ for this game. It turned out to be pretty good, usually with the background color changes. I hope one day Auroriax will include it in his collection !

Mobile friendly version : 
https://auroriax.github.io/PuzzleScript/play.html?p=c65aa0e6f030328728b878448ae1...

Source code :
https://auroriax.github.io/PuzzleScript/editor.html?hack=c65aa0e6f030328728b8784...
